title: The Good Karma Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, Indian, Italian, Organic, Buffet, Take-out
description: Lunch buffet service held at USC's University Park Campus, religious center, dining room 108. Operating during school semesters and is open to public. Organic vegan food, prepared to Vaishnava Hindu dietary standards. You are encouraged to bring your own reusable eating ware and to-go container. Occasional live music.
